alert.note: Alert for Central Blue Mountains; Central Mountains of Oregon; Southern Blue and Strawberry Mountains; Wallowa District (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 02 at 7:43PM PDT until September 03 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...DRY AND UNSTABLE CONDITIONS ALSO EXPECTED THROUGH EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT SATURDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES OR640, OR642, OR644, AND OR645... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 640 Central Mountains of Oregon, 642 Southern Blue and Strawberry Mountains, 644 Central Blue Mountains and 645 Wallowa District. * WINDS...South 10 to 15 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 7 percent and slow improvement overnight. * IMPACTS...An increase in fire spread and activity will be possible on new and existing fires. Extreme fire behavior is possible. * HAINES...As high as 6.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Central Blue Mountains; Central Mountains of Oregon; Southern Blue and Strawberry Mountains; Wallowa District
